title: Day 339 (2 Corinthians 5-9) - Year 3
itunes:title: Day 339 (2 Corinthians 5-9) - Year 3
description:
SHOW NOTES: 

- All the info you need to START is on our website! - Join our PATREON family for bonus perks!

- Get your TBR merch

- Show credits

 

FROM TODAY’S PODCAST: 

- 1 John 5:13

- Article 1 of 4: How Can I Have Assurance of My Salvation? (GotQuestions.org)

- Article 2 of 4: How Can I Have Assurance of My Salvation? (Christianity.com)

- Article 3 of 4: The Agonizing Problem of the Assurance of Salvation

- Article 4 of 4: Insecurity and the Assurance of Salvation

- 1 Corinthians 7:10-16

- Find out more about D-Group

- Check out our D-Group Promo Video
